video.title: Father of the Pride
video.synopsis: A host of celebs lend their voices to this animated series about the real stars of Siegfried and Roy's Las Vegas act -- the white lions.

episodes.synopsis: Larry and Kate play matchmaker to two neurotic pandas while Siegfried and Roy try to get the pandas to mate using science.
episodes.title: What's Black and White and Depressed All Over?

episodes.synopsis: Larry's debut as lead lion is going to take place on "The Today Show," which makes him anxious; Siegfried carries on a one-way feud with Matt Lauer.
episodes.title: Larry's Debut, and Sweet Darryl Hannah Too

episodes.synopsis: Kate and Larry suspect their daughter is abusing catnip; Siegfried and Roy make their first-ever trip to 7-11 to taste a Big Gulp.
episodes.title: Catnip and Trust

episodes.synopsis: Larry promises Hunter that he can get Donkey from Shrek to come to his school; Siegfried and Roy fight a small business owner.
episodes.title: Donkey

episodes.synopsis: Larry frees a left-leaning lobster whom Sierra has befriended at a restaurant; Siegfried and Roy await Barbra Streisand's arrival at the Mirage.
episodes.title: And the Revolution Continues

episodes.synopsis: Larry steals the tigers' TV in an effort to put some spontaneity back into his marriage; Sarmoti teaches Hunter the ancient ways of the African lion.
episodes.title: Possession

episodes.synopsis: Larry is on a diet and is tempted to eat Snack's new girlfriend; Sarmoti and Sierra sqaure off in a poker duel.
episodes.title: One Man's Meat is Another Man's Girlfriend

episodes.synopsis: Larry is burned out from work and fakes an injury to get a break.
episodes.title: Rehabilitation

episodes.synopsis: Kate runs for PTA president and accidentally offends the turkey constituency; Roy tries to domesticate Snack.
episodes.title: The Thanksgiving Episode

episodes.synopsis: Sarmoti moves in with Larry and Kate; Kate "accidentally" destroys Sarmoti's zebra rug. She and Larry contemplate replacing it by whacking a zebra.
episodes.title: Sarmoti Moves In

episodes.synopsis: Larry forgets his anniversary again and has to trek through the desert to find Kate in time to make amends.
episodes.title: Road Trip

episodes.synopsis: Larry the lion becomes the new star of the Siegfried and Roy show, replacing his antagonistic father-in-law, Sarmoti.
episodes.title: Stage Fright

episodes.synopsis: Kate joins a woman's group and Larry feels threatened; Siegfried and Roy decide to reinvent their past to thwart competing magicians Dante and Phil.
episodes.title: The Siegfried and Roy Fantasy Experience Movie
